short_summary: CT142 DASH 8 AIRFRAME AND LANDING GEAR COMPONENTS AND ASSOCIATED ACCESSORIES REPAIR AND OVERHAUL
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: AITA appeler la remise à la date limite de la promesse d'achat du lot fourni. Tout document requis et la soumission doivent être soumis au plus tard le 23 novembre 2022 à 14:00 EST...
full_summary:
**Following Tender Notice:** **Tender Title:** Acquisition of DASH 8 Airframe and Landing Gear Components and Associated Accessories Repair and Overhaul Services **Reference Number:** WS3713841882-Doc3715560052 **Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RSO) **Completion Date:** This purchasing activity has been cancelled. **Description:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites qualified bidders to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for the repair and overhaul of various components and accessories for DASH 8 aircraft, which are operated by the Royal Canadian Air Force. **Service Requirements:** The Standing Offer is required for the repair and overhaul of the following aircraft components and accessories: * DASH 8 Airframe Components * Landing Gear Components * Associated Accessories **Delivery Location:** The delivery location for these services will be at 17 Wing in Winnipeg, Manitoba. **Acceptance and Evaluation:** Acceptance will be based on the lowest price, with all other factors being equal. **Access to Tender Documents:** Electronic tender documents can be accessed through the Supplier Registration on the Canada Buys web-site (). Bidders must submit their bid electronically by 2:00 PM, Eastern Standard Time, on November 23, 2022 to be considered for this standing offer. Tenders submitted after the scheduled closing time may be declared non-conformable. ## Madeline Hastings ## Project Manager ## Government Procurement Office ## Public Works and Government Services Canada ## Gatineau, Quebec ## Email: madeline.hastings@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca ## FAX: ## Telephone: ## Start Clamp False Friendly man Page will be corrupted on insertion of this markup as I convert \section{Project Information}
